caption.p: X-ray films and appearance photos before and after operation. (A) The left foot X-ray film (AP) before operation. (B) The left foot X-ray film (AP position) after operation. (C) The lateral X-ray film of the left foot before operation. (D) The lateral X-ray film of the left foot after operation. (E) The posterior foot line of force before operation. (F) The posterior foot line of force after operation.
